overview:
Gaurav Oberoi is the CEO and Co-Founder at Precision Polling, where he wears many hats: marketer, product manager, sales guy, and engineer. His past has prepared him well with a wide range of experiences that include: building and selling a consumer internet company (BillMonk), working as product manager at a consumer startup for industry veteran Mitch Kapor (at Xmarks), managing a team of engineers at a mobile payments company (Obopay), and working as an engineer on a core backend team at Amazon (Search and Browse).

Gaurav also co-founded Seattle Tech Startups, one of the largest startup technology communities in the state of Washington. He graduated from Rice University (TX) with a degree in Computer Science.
